intro: Use rhythm to guide planets along a winding path, alone or in 4-player co-op!
description:
A Dance of Fire and Ice is a deceptively simple rhythm game: press the button along to the beat to keep your orbiting planets on the path.

But the path isn't always so simple. Before long, you'll travel across different twisting shapes and patterns, representing different rhythms spread across all sorts of genres.

This version includes the base game "A Dance of Fire and Ice", the expansion "Neo Cosmos", and all-new 4-player local multiplayer.

EXPLORE THE COSMOS
Soar through each genre of music in a variety of colorful fantasy landscapes in over 30 different worlds.

PREDICT EVERY MOVEMENT
With a track that shows you every rhythm ahead of time, you’ll learn to sight-read levels as they come. No tricks, and nothing is reaction-based.

TEAM UP WITH FRIENDS
Play in a group of up to four friends in local co-operative play! When a friend misses a beat, keep pushing onward to revive them and pull them back into the song.

CHALLENGE THE OVERSEER IN NEO COSMOS
When you're ready for a challenge, jump into the "Neo Cosmos" story expansion. Directed by TaroNuke (creator of NotITG and UKSRT), it includes plenty of surprises, new characters, and whole new game mechanics to mix things up.

CALIBRATE YOUR EXPERIENCE
Manually adjust your calibration on-the-fly, or use our auto-calibration method. We're musicians, and it hurts us to play off-sync games.
